name: Crystalline Refraction
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Six shimmering crystal shards spin into existence and orbit around your head. While they remain, you can spend 1 AP as a response to making a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on a spell to destroy one shard and automatically succeed on the saving throw.

For 1 AP once per turn, you can instead fling a shard at high speed into a creature within 60 feet of you. It takes 2d8 piercing damage and has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws to concentrate on a spell until the start of its next turn.
